meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Spain and several Latin American countries.
meanings.sent1: I exchanged my dollars for pisos to use in Spain.
meanings.sent2: In Spain, you can buy many things with pisos.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally paid with pisos instead of dollars at the store!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a thousand pisos.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pisos in my wallet reminded me of my trip to Spain.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'piso', meaning a flat or apartment.
meanings.sent1: Their family lived in two cozy pisos in the city.
meanings.sent2: The new building has many modern pisos available for rent.
meanings.sent3: I dreamt of flying in a piso above the city skyline.
meanings.sent4: The piso was a hive of activity, with neighbors chatting in the hallway.
meanings.sent5: The piso's balcony offered a stunning view of the park.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'piso', meaning a floor or story of a building.
meanings.sent1: The elevator stopped at multiple pisos before reaching the top floor.
meanings.sent2: The office is located on the fifth piso of the building.
meanings.sent3: The cat climbed to the highest piso of the tree and refused to come down.
meanings.sent4: Each piso of the tower represented a different chapter in its history.
meanings.sent5: The haunted piso creaked with every step, sending shivers down my spine.
